headline.main: KAISER ASKS PEACE, THEN WAR ON REDS; Warring Nations Should Join to Smash Bolshevism, He Writes to Bigelow Visit to Ex-Kaiser Planned WANTS ALLIES, GERMANY TO JOIN AGAINST RUSSIA
